title: Independent adjuster field inspection reports
dataVerified: Adjuster name, adjuster license number, claimant name, property address, vehicle VIN (if applicable), inspection date, damage assessment
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Report amendment status (if report amended). Link to adjuster firm system (insurance carriers and legal counsel, requires authentication)
rationale: Tamper-evident damage assessments for insurance claims. Firm domain binding prevents forged inspection reports. Field verification by insurance carriers and legal teams during litigation. Critical for claim disputes where independent adjuster reports are key evidence. Prevents alteration of damage assessments after initial inspection.
